actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution expressing the condolences of the House on the death of the Honorable Edwin B. Forsythe, a Representative from the State of New Jersey.

summary.text: Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Edwin B. Forsythe of New Jersey.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the condolences of the House on the death of the Honorable Edwin B. Forsythe, a Representative from the State of New Jersey.
